external_games.name: Kita no Chi to Hitori no Shoujo: Koropokkuru no Negai

name: Kita no Chi to Hitori no Shoujo: Koropokkuru no Negai
summary:
Marimo Kushiro was about to go home as usual.
There, she meets Kororu, a being known as an ayakashi.
It seems that Koror has a request for Mai Suzumo.
His wish was, ``I want you to defeat the bear demon.''
Mai Suzumo takes the amulet (ofuda) and stands up to make Kororu's wish come true.
--This is a story set in Hokkaido.
